[2 rows x 8 columns],   Professional Development provided for Teachers\r\rMeasure2017-182018-192019-20\rNumber of school days dedicated to Staff Development and Continuous Improvement4811185\r\rAll training and curriculum development activities at Collegewood Elementary School revolve around the California State Content Standards and\rFrameworks.
